hero.title: Logistics solutions for Fashion and Footwear
hero.description: We connect your collections with every point of sale, ensuring agility, presentation and availability.

intro.text: At Yobel SCM we offer comprehensive logistics solutions for the fashion and footwear industry. We manage warehousing, distribution and value-added services with flexibility for seasons, collections and special channels.

items.title: Flexible Warehousing
items.description: Inventory management by SKU, size, color or season with WMS and real-time rotation control.

items.title: Omnichannel Distribution
items.description: B2B, retail and e-commerce deliveries with full traceability and 99.6% OTIF compliance.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Labeling, tagging, ironing, folding and preparation according to each sales channel requirements.

items.title: Reconditioning
items.description: Quality review, cleaning, re-tagging and repackaging for resale or liquidation.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Import/export coordination of garments, footwear and accessories with customs compliance and traceability.

benefits.title: Speed, presentation and flexibility
items: Reduced time to market for new collections.
Control by SKU, size, color and season.
Flexibility for peak seasons or outlet channels.
Guaranteed presentation at point of sale.

items.title: Collection launches
items.fullDesc: Synchronized distribution for new season releases.

items.title: Retail replenishment
items.fullDesc: Continuous supply to stores, corners and multibrand.

items.title: E-commerce management
items.fullDesc: Preparation and direct dispatch to end consumer.

items.title: Returns management
items.fullDesc: Quality review, reconditioning and channel redistribution.

certificates.description: We operate with international certifications that guarantee quality, safety and sustainability at every stage.
